goal: Expand core functionality and improve system integration for the Meta Agentic AI System
acceptance_criteria: All new code must pass unit tests
All changes should be reviewed by at least one other team member
New functionality should integrate seamlessly with existing system components

deliverable.description: Agent communication protocol implemented using gRPC
Updated README.md with new architecture overview

tasks: Implement agent communication protocol using gRPC
Develop initial version of the task management subsystem
Create basic monitoring and logging capabilities
Build unit tests for existing agents
Refactor bootstrap process for better extensibility
Update README.md with new architecture overview
